snippet: Mother Jones senior reporter Shane Bauer has won a $25,000 prize from Harvard University for an investigative report that exposed mismanagement in private prisons....

headline.main: David Rubinger, 92, Photographer Who Chronicled Israeli History, Dies
headline.print_headline: David Rubinger, Who Captured Israeli History, Dies at 92

lead_paragraph: Mother Jones senior reporter Shane Bauer has won a $25,000 prize from Harvard University for an investigative report that exposed mismanagement in private prisons.
